Surprisingly, this is a pretty good game. At first when I started playing I was thinking of deleting it, but as time went on, it started getting more fun. If you are a big fan on FPS, this is worth downloading. Some parts got EXTREMELY frustrating (note: I played on hard). Towards the end I had to cheat to win, because it got so hard.

Press TAB ingame to bring up the console and type these in:
dinkydau - God mode
madminute - 999 bullets
I love you.

I was wondering why my torrents were only downloading
at 30-40k a sec when they had 2000+ seeds, after a few
hours of research and playing with peer guardian 2, I
found 100's of connections per seconds comming from
two sources. media defender and some other (forget).

I added this to my firewall ACL.

Deny All Protocol ANY 216.73.85.0-216.73.88.255 ANY Any
Deny All Protocol ANY 209.62.175.0-209.62.177.255 ANY Any
Deny All Protocol ANY 38.99.252.0-38.99.253.255 ANY Any
Deny All Protocol ANY 64.93.88.0-64.93.93.255 ANY Any
Deny All Protocol ANY 38.102.233.0-38.102.233.255 ANY Any
Deny All Protocol ANY 64.93.0.0-64.93.255.255 ANY Any

Boom, 400k a sec downloads once again.

As soon as I started peer guardian I noticed the
download speed going up, but it topped out when I
added those to the ACL. 

Beware mediadefender.com

those nasty vietcong can kill you with one shot, it's really annoying !! even on easy difficulty level.

i know what you will say ... "you are not good at FPS" but it's not about that, i find this game annoying.

peace !!
oh .. and it's one of the most successful Vietnam games i have ever played. but nevertheless they could have made it a little more easier

FYI.  This game has some annoying problems.  (Design, not the rip)
It's the stick on the ground and you can't move forward crap.  It is a 3 year old game.  It's still a fun game.
